website_summaries.verdict: Suppositories may not be the most pleasant to use, but if you need relief sooner rather than later, these are your best bet.
pros: Many find results are almost instant

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without them!
customer_reviews.text: Because my personal health issues I use these every day. After years of using large enemas, these are SO MUCH BETTER! Seriously, they make my life a lot easier. For me they work in minutes without cramping or irritation. Walmart is cheaper but they rarely have more than 2 or 3 boxes in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Laney7

customer_reviews.title: Best there is
customer_reviews.text: Needed some help after surgery, as meds had locked up the insides big time. These are excellent to get you fast relief and feeling better again. Easy to use, no mess and effective. Have recommended them to friends who needed some help and all had the same results. Also like having them shipped to me and confidentiality maintained.
customer_reviews.author: Been there, tried that

customer_reviews.title: An Easy Solution.
customer_reviews.text: This is always on hand for the constipation problems which are a frequency for a family member. It is minimally invasive and produces relief when constipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!
customer_reviews.text: I not sure about giving it to yourself, but I help my other half with it. Has to take iron and then needs this. Works in minutes of sooner so be near restroom. It's a suppository so don't eat it! There was a question of how it tastes so ? I wear disposable gloves so don't forget those.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable insertion
customer_reviews.text: The tips of this product is not easy insertion like the fleet laxative with saline. The tips are sharp and make is very difficult and sometimes painful for insertion. The lubrications does not make it easier. Change the tips please!
customer_reviews.author: kareen

customer_reviews.title: Review of Fleet Liquid Glycerin Suppositories.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be most effective and convenient. It has solved my problem of chronic constipation. Frequently, there is an urge to go a second time after about 5 hours, due to some increased mucus secretion.
customer_reviews.author: ekeninijo

customer_reviews.title: If you need it, it works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works so fast and comfortably when needed. Much easier to use than glycerin suppositories. The tip is very blunt, and sometimes painful to insert.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Serves it purpose...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I needed to get things moving and these do the trick without any discomfort. Just be close to the bathroom once you use it!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: If you can't go, buy these for quick relief.
customer_reviews.text: When you can't go, these will fix that within a minute or two. No after effects that can happen with bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Davis

customer_reviews.title: Strong product for a Tough Problem.
customer_reviews.text: After using these Fleet Suppositories for over a year, I truly appreciate the excruciating gas and constipation pain they rescue me from. Yes, occasionally I have cramps after using the product. However, the longer term relief is well worth it. Original Review: [This product evacuates faster and more completely than an enema. However, it is so strong it gives me stomach cramps]
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A

customer_reviews.title: ONLYL GOT ONE BOX.
customer_reviews.text: It says 3 boxes of fleets... ONLY GOT ONE. i would not pay 12 bucks for one again. im not sure if this was a MISTAKE or what>> very very disappointed and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Works very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have a slew of chronic illnesses that cause constipation (Fibromyalgia, Ehler’s Danlos etc) and these are often the only thing that can “get things started”. Even after I’ve already used an oral laxative, I still need these. There’s also not really anything else like them, so they’re very worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabster

customer_reviews.title: usability
customer_reviews.text: these enemas used to good. The last time I bought them, they were very scented. It is very difficult for chemically sensitive people to tolerate so much scent. It would be nice if they could be completely unscented and odor free like before.
customer_reviews.author: shirin

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t actually give a crap about product reviews but I do in this case :) It worked but I’m not sure if I should have more ounces to the package?
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Paid $15 for ONE box?!!
customer_reviews.text: I've order this before 18 times. Never had a problem. Today I get a package with ONE box in it. Are more coming? Doesn't say so on order. WTHeck?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shedd

customer_reviews.title: Order needs completion.
customer_reviews.text: My order came with only one box instead of 3. Order Dec. 16. It was a “buy it again”. My original order of the same had 3 boxes in it. I’d like my other 2 boxes. My subscribe and save that I started In between these 2 orders will be correct I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.W

customer_reviews.title: USEFUL WHEN NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I needed these a while back. They work best with an enema chaser
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes in a set. Saves me multiple trips to the store. I have ordered this multiple times and 2 of the times it was being sold "old" or "new". I didn't understand but ordered "old". I think it was just new packaging? It arrived with no issues and looked like the ones I get at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Chimom

customer_reviews.title: Misshipment, again
customer_reviews.text: For the second time, Amazon shipped me one box, not the three advertised. Come on guys, figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the amount I was suppose to.
customer_reviews.text: I only received one box it said I would receive three boxes I can buy one box in the store 4.99 so I would not want to spend 15.39 for one box.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked for my nephew without any discomfort. Well, you know, aside from sticking them up your bum.
customer_reviews.author: Morbius858

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: States you are purchasing 3 pls of 4....received ONE pk...I just paid $14 for one pk..don’t get ripped off

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It really works I just use it once and I was really impressed ! It can make you feel better in less than 2 minutes but I don't think it works if you have a serious problem with constipation but for me works great
customer_reviews.author: Jeimyroj

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: due to many surgeries have been using this product now for years cannot do with ut it

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING OR MISTAKE?
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as Fleet Liquid Glycerin Suppositories for Adult Constipation, 4 Count ( Pack of 3). I received 1 package (4 COUNT) instead of 3. Of course if I tried to return it as just 1 instead of the advertised 3 for a refund, I am sure it would be refused.
customer_reviews.author: klivey

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: If you need instant relief and have not gone in 3 days, this is it. Best invention since the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Hrf

customer_reviews.title: SCI. Something I need on a regular basis
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing a suppostory oh what fun. Due to health issues I need to use these a lot. Good price and good seller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with little ones (half the dosing) and adults alike-works within minutes.

customer_reviews.text: Best item out there for a quick and effective BM. Recommend to all, especially quad- and paraplegics

We HIGHLY recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Comments about an order
customer_reviews.text: The product ordered arrived. It met my expectation. Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: The constipation was terrible. The slightest tension in the back caused string ...
customer_reviews.text: After lumbar laminectomy three weeks I had severe pain during defecation. The constipation was terrible. The slightest tension in the back caused string pain in the spine nerves. Fleet liquid glycerin was the only product that helped my bowel movement painless and easy. I highly recommend it who replaced the disk and took strong pain medication.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I love it so much.I bought it for my girlfriend who has a problem with her.

customer_reviews.title: Price is better than the stores here.  will not purchase  from Amazon when the price bounces up
customer_reviews.text: Price is better than the stores here. will not purchase from Amazon when the price bounces up In my opinion this is the best product for constipation. Just use it before you get really blocked up. I have problems from medicine.
customer_reviews.author: KISS_s9999v99

customer_reviews.title: Works In Seconds
customer_reviews.text: Buy for my autistic son who too often ignores the urge to go. In seconds it give him the urge to go. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works super fast for me, like in less than 2-3 mins. I can feel it coming. Just not crazy about the dispenser it doesn't empty it all out.
customer_reviews.author: HMC

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Living overseas your food choices and type of water are limited. This works but not instantly for me. Takes about 24 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have used these small Fleet enemas for many years. They are small and much easier to use than the "regular"'-- make that mammoth--ones. It is no problem to have them handy when on a trip. They are hard to find; they must sell out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: highclasslowtech

customer_reviews.title: Fast relief
customer_reviews.text: Best laxative, works immediately, been using it for more than a year, completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: assem elbendary

customer_reviews.title: Like i need to be in the vacinity of a ...
customer_reviews.text: They work fast for me. Like i need to be in the vacinity of a bathroom within 1 min.....sorry if TMI!
customer_reviews.author: M. L-S

customer_reviews.title: Works in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: The directions say it can take up to 15 min, I found relief in less than 5. Great product. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Regular use for my elderly mother, very gentle and effective. Always try to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Juliep

customer_reviews.title: Easy Adequate Shopping
customer_reviews.text: The convenience of shopping from for this product is great. This product works much faster than the traditional suppository because there is know wait to melt time. The difference between waiting time allows me to be freed up sooner to get on with my day.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Holly

customer_reviews.title: fleet adult liquid glycerin suppositories
customer_reviews.text: This works in almost an instant. Trying not to sound gross, but after its' introduction in a sitting position on the toilet, it is not wise to get up and start to move away from said toilet.....if u get my drift.
customer_reviews.author: barbara wallace

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The easy insertion tips makes getting the job done quick and painless, and with a total of 12 you can store them away so you always have one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Theophilus Knight

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Discreet
customer_reviews.text: Having to worry if the stores carry this has always been a problem along with pricing. At my local grocery or pharmacy I was paying upwards of $6.00 per four count box. Buying online is cheaper, quick and discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better out there!
customer_reviews.text: I needed help with constipation when I was pregnant and my doctor recommended these. They are like a miracle. That was 6 years ago, and I still always make sure I have it on hand just in case. Also, my pediatrician told me it was okay to use on my baby/toddler when she was really constipated. So, not only are they safe, but they work better than any pill ever could. You get instant relief. Can't recommend it highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. not enough contents to do ANY good
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. not enough contents to do ANY good. will never order this again
customer_reviews.author: Rick T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is thank god for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: glycerin
customer_reviews.text: did not work well with my enterocele. caused a lot of cramping. Might work great for others. surgery is needed
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: These aren't an enema
customer_reviews.text: So much for a great deal. My fault for not reading more closely. Fleets error for making the packages exactly the same as the enemas.
customer_reviews.author: Would rather be at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Exorcise your bowels
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used one of these, a scene worse than The Exorcism unfolded in my bathroom. It was violent and noisy, plus the smell was ungodly, but I emerged lighter and happier. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jakeanielsen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be discouraged by the small pkg. Dispite the size, they work!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the larger ones for years. Not daily but about Once per week. I took a trip and did not have any. Found these at the local market. I laughed at them when I got them and figured they wouldn’t work. I used two because I figured, small would be less effective. I should have read the instructions. First time was quite an experience; I’ve since used only one when needed. Works great. Less intrusive.
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Others indicated it took about 15 minutes, but for me it took longer; about 45. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mdchick

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I was using Fleet for a while and then switched to enemeez. Out of the two I like this one a little better. I think it’s because the saline tends to get to it’s destination easier, the applicator is definitely smoother also. It’s always worth trying something different because we all react differently. One issue that I did encounter with enemeez was some tubes would be almost empty. Which isn’t good if it’s your last go too.
customer_reviews.author: MatthewGB

customer_reviews.title: It's an excellent product, but I didn't receive the number of boxes I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: It was not as advertised. I have ordered it many times over many years and am happy with the product. I ordered it the same as always. A pack of three. I only received one box instead of ggree. I had to order it again and the same thing happened. Only one box instead of three. I spent $12.97 twice and only got $4.00 worth of product. I have no way to get a number to report this.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne J.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: These didn't seem to work for me very well. When you insert and squeeze it, all of the liquid immediately comes back out. I've just been taking probiotics instead and those help me out way more than this product did.
customer_reviews.author: Meditation Moselie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product works great
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for constipation!! Easy on the body and works in less than 5 minutes. Much better than anything else I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H

customer_reviews.title: Good product, better price.
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived as promised. The price was a great deal, better than buying the individual boxes at a store. The product is accurately described and is a good option if you don't want to travel with the larger sized versions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works extra quick
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this product. Worked in less than one minute. Good thing I was sitting on toilet because it came exploding out. I couldn’t have held it in if I wanted to. So beware it may work quickly. For me quickly is worth it as other suppositories have not worked in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! I can’t find these for less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I can’t find these for less than $7/box at my local stores. This price is like getting a box free. As far as the product goes, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Aikiko

customer_reviews.title: Quick relief
customer_reviews.text: It feels odd to review this product, but here it goes. These suppositories mostly do the job. The small bulb is easy to use, but there is often quite a bit of product left after use. No more butts.
customer_reviews.author: Beth (part of real name)

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: If you need them, they are cheaper here than CVS!

customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for his bowel treatments, works very quickly

customer_reviews.title: This product is going in the right direction.

customer_reviews.title: Relief at last!!
customer_reviews.text: My MS makes it difficult for me to go sometimes. I just need a little help. These are great! They do the trick and it only takes a minute or 2 at most. They've made my life so much better!

customer_reviews.title: Misleading discription
customer_reviews.text: I am very irritated with this seller for misleading their product. It specifically says pack of three and the sent 1 box. Pack of 3 means 3 boxes. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Amy B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works in minutes
customer_reviews.text: They work great. If you are having constipation problems these will quickly and easily get things moving without having to deal with stomach cramps. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Brown

customer_reviews.title: Work fast and not a drug.
customer_reviews.text: I use these, they are not enemas, and you do not get the problems with them, that can happen with a laxative. They "help" w/o being a stimulant of any kind. But, you don't have to take for days or eve the day before. Works within a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: JupiterGirl

product_meta.title: Fleet Laxative Liquid Glycerin Suppositories | 4 Each 7.5 oz | Pack of 3 (12 Count) Fast Constipation Relief in Minutes
product_meta.description: Fleet Liquid Glycerin Suppositories 4 Each (Pack of 3)
feature_bullets: Constipation relief in minutes (generally produces a bowel movement in 15 60 minutes)
Insert rectally to treat at the site of the problem; Will NOT upset the digestive system
Works by drawing water into the stool to promote a bowel movement
No mess lubricated Gentle Glide Tip
Easy to use just insert, squeeze, remove, and discard

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
